description: This file defines API endpoints for job tools functionalities such as resume preview and interview simulation using FastAPI. It includes route definitions, request/response schemas, and business logic for returning sample data.

methods.name: resume_preview(payload: ResumePreviewIn, _: User = Depends(get_current_user), db: Session = Depends(get_db))
methods.description: Generates a resume preview summarizing content and providing tips.
